name: ColorPicker
description: A picker component for color selection
note: This is a screen width component

props.name: colors
props.description: Array of colors for the picker's color palette (hex values)

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the selected swatch

props.name: animatedIndex
props.description: The index of the item to animate at first render

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback for the picker's color palette change

props.name: accessibilityLabels
props.description: Accessibility labels as an object of strings

props.name: testID
props.description: The test id for e2e tests
